attributes.action: advise the BBC to adjust their weather map so that at least one city/town in Northern England is on the map as at the moment there is nothing between Birmingham and Newcastle
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I AM FED UP THAT WHENEVER THE BBC HAS THE WEATHER ON, THE SOUTH OF ENGLAND HAS LONDON, PORTSMOUTH AND ABOUT ANOTHER FOUR CITIES, WALES HAS TWO, SCOTLAND TWO OR THREE BUT THERE IS A BLANK ON THE MAP BETWEEN BIRMINGHAM AND NEWCASTLE.

WHAT ABOUT NOTTINGHAM, LEEDS, MANCHESTER, LINCOLN, HULL, SHEFFIELD, OLDHAM, HUDDERSFIELD ETC!?

BASICALLY EVERY COUNTY NORTH OF BIRMINGHAM DOESN'T EXIST ACCORDING TO THE BBC WEATHER CENTRE EVEN THOUGH THESE AREAS ARE DENSLEY POPULATED.

WE DEMAND THAT THE BBC STARTS SHOWING IMPORTANT NORTHERN CITIES ON THEIR MAIN WEATHER MAP!

rejection.details: Please contact the BBC with your request.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
